GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

'GET /api/articles/:article_id'.description: retuns an individual object selected by its id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments'.description: serves an array of all comments belonding to a specific article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves a newly posted comment. Does not work for non-existing users, require a username from the database

comment.body: the Office US is way better than the UKs version

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by id increasing its vote count. Request body accepts an object in a form: {inc_votes: newVote}
